categories.name: Specialty Items
categories.description: Popular food items and other specialty offerings

categories.name: Protein Shakes
categories.description: Premium protein shakes to fuel your workout and recovery

categories.name: Teas
categories.description: Refreshing and energizing teas for hydration and wellness

categories.name: Mega Teas
categories.description: Enhanced teas with pre-workout supplements and performance boosters

menuItems.name: Iced Coffee
menuItems.description: Smooth and refreshing iced coffee made with premium beans. Perfect for that morning pick-me-up or pre-workout energy boost.

menuItems.name: Green Detox
menuItems.description: Fresh green juice blend with spinach, kale, cucumber, and apple. Packed with nutrients and perfect for post-workout recovery.

menuItems.name: Super Shake
menuItems.description: Powerful protein shake with banana, berries, and premium whey protein. Designed for maximum recovery and muscle building.

menuItems.name: Parfait with Toppings
menuItems.description: Greek yogurt parfait layered with fresh berries and granola. Light, protein-rich, and perfect for a healthy breakfast or snack.

menuItems.name: Waffles with Toppings
menuItems.description: Fluffy protein waffles made fresh daily. Crispy on the outside, soft on the inside, and ready for your favorite toppings.

menuItems.name: Oatmeal with Fruits
menuItems.description: Steel-cut oatmeal topped with fresh seasonal fruits. Hearty, nutritious, and perfect for sustained energy throughout your workout.

menuItems.name: Acai Bowl
menuItems.description: Premium acai bowl with granola, banana, and honey. Rich in antioxidants and perfect for pre-workout energy or post-workout recovery.

menuItems.name: Fruit Bowl
menuItems.description: Fresh seasonal fruit bowl with a variety of colorful, nutrient-rich fruits. Light, refreshing, and perfect for hydration and vitamins.

menuItems.name: Cookies and Cream
menuItems.description: Classic cookies and cream protein shake with real cookie pieces. Rich, creamy, and perfect for satisfying your sweet tooth while fueling your muscles.

menuItems.name: Dulce de Leche
menuItems.description: Smooth dulce de leche protein shake with caramel notes. Sweet, indulgent, and packed with premium whey protein for optimal recovery.

menuItems.name: Chicha
menuItems.description: Traditional chicha protein shake with purple corn and spices. Unique flavor profile with authentic Peruvian taste and premium protein.

menuItems.name: Chocolate
menuItems.description: Rich chocolate protein shake made with premium cocoa and whey protein. Classic flavor that never disappoints for post-workout recovery.

menuItems.name: Choco-Coco
menuItems.description: Chocolate and coconut protein shake with tropical notes. Perfect blend of rich chocolate and refreshing coconut for a unique flavor experience.

menuItems.name: Banana Caramel
menuItems.description: Smooth banana caramel protein shake with real banana and caramel notes. Sweet, creamy, and perfect for satisfying cravings while fueling recovery.

menuItems.name: Praline
menuItems.description: Luxurious praline protein shake with rich nutty notes and caramel undertones. Premium flavor for those who appreciate sophisticated taste profiles.

menuItems.name: Pumpkin Spice
menuItems.description: Seasonal pumpkin spice protein shake with warming spices. Perfect fall flavor with cinnamon, nutmeg, and real pumpkin for a cozy post-workout treat.

menuItems.name: Strawberry
menuItems.description: Fresh strawberry protein shake with real fruit and premium whey protein. Sweet, refreshing, and packed with antioxidants for optimal recovery.

menuItems.name: Strawberry Cheesecake
menuItems.description: Indulgent strawberry cheesecake protein shake with creamy notes and fresh strawberry flavor. Dessert-like treat that fuels your fitness goals.

menuItems.name: Orange Cream
menuItems.description: Creamy orange cream protein shake with citrus notes and smooth vanilla undertones. Refreshing and nostalgic flavor for your workout recovery.

menuItems.name: Cafe Latte
menuItems.description: Smooth cafe latte protein shake with premium coffee and creamy notes. Perfect for coffee lovers who want their caffeine fix with protein benefits.

menuItems.name: Raspberry Tea
menuItems.description: Refreshing raspberry tea with natural fruit flavor. Light, sweet, and perfect for hydration during or after your workout.

menuItems.name: Lemon Tea
menuItems.description: Zesty lemon tea with natural citrus notes. Energizing and perfect for detoxification and immune support.

menuItems.name: Peach Tea
menuItems.description: Smooth peach tea with natural fruit essence. Sweet, refreshing, and perfect for post-workout hydration.

menuItems.name: Chai Tea
menuItems.description: Spiced chai tea with warming cinnamon, ginger, and cardamom. Served with your choice of milk for a comforting treat.

menuItems.name: NRG Tea
menuItems.description: Herbalife NRG tea blend with natural energy boosters. Designed to enhance focus and provide sustained energy for your workouts.

menuItems.name: Cinnamon Tea
menuItems.description: Warming cinnamon tea with natural spice notes. Perfect for metabolism support and post-workout relaxation.

menuItems.name: Fruit Mega Tea
menuItems.description: Premium fruit blend mega tea with enhanced supplements. Perfect pre-workout option with a variety of performance boosters available.

menuItems.name: Passionfruit Mega Tea
menuItems.description: Exotic passionfruit mega tea with tropical notes. Enhanced with premium supplements for maximum pre-workout performance.

menuItems.name: Lemon Mega Tea
menuItems.description: Zesty lemon mega tea with enhanced energy boosters. Perfect for pre-workout focus and sustained performance during training.

menuItems.name: Grenadine Mega Tea
menuItems.description: Sweet grenadine mega tea with pomegranate notes. Enhanced with premium supplements for explosive pre-workout energy.

menuItems.name: Orange Mega Tea
menuItems.description: Citrus orange mega tea with vitamin C boost. Enhanced with premium supplements for optimal pre-workout performance and recovery.
